name: Abridged
text:
Run quickly from the wasteland woods/ When clouds darken to rain.

/ The air will disappoint you.

/ The ground will lie,/ Slab-splashed and dense,/ Well-lessoned in alchymyâ€™s/ Fraud.

/ I do not want you to shiver/ There, iron-propped,/ Or cold-contained.

/ I beg you.

/ Fly quickly when the redwoods/ Disappear./
